title: Processed Note Schema
description: Schema for validating processed ethnographic notes.

date.description: The date of the observation in YYYY-MM-DD format.

location.description: The geographical or contextual location of the observation.

tags.description: A list of keywords or tags associated with the note.

source.description: The original source of the ethnographic note (e.g., 'Interview', 'Book', 'Observation').

original_file.description: The original markdown filename from which this note was processed.

Purification.description: Content related to the Purification step.

Containment.description: Content related to the Containment step.

Anchoring.description: Content related to the Anchoring step.

Dissolution.description: Content related to the Dissolution step.

Liminality.description: Content related to the Liminality step.

Encounter.description: Content related to the Encounter step.

Integration.description: Content related to the Integration step.

Emergence.description: Content related to the Emergence step.
